executable.title: Resample Image (TubeTK)
executable.description: Resamples an image to match another image (origin, orientation, and spacing), to be isotropic, or to have a specific spacing.
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the TubeTK project at Kitware.

parameters.label: Resampling Options
parameters.description: Parameters that determine how the resmpling is performed.

image.name: matchImage
image.label: Match to Image
image.description: The image from which origin, orientation, and spacing should be taken.

double-vector.name: spacing
double-vector.label: Use Spacing
double-vector.description: Spacing to be used. Should be an N-vector. Overrides matchImage.

double-vector.name: origin
double-vector.label: Use Origin
double-vector.description: Origin to be used. Should be an N-vector. Overrides matchImage.

integer-vector.name: index
integer-vector.label: Use Index
integer-vector.description: Index to be used. Should be an N-vector. Overrides matchImage.

double-vector.name: resampleFactor
double-vector.label: Resample Factor
double-vector.description: Factor to increase size. 2,2,2 doubles size in each dimension. Should be an N-vector. Overrides matchImage and setSpacing.

boolean.name: makeIsotropic
boolean.label: Make Isotropic
boolean.description: Make spacing isotropic. Overrides other matchImage and setSpacing.

boolean.name: makeHighResIso
boolean.label: Make High Resolution Isotropic
boolean.description: Make spacing isotropic - using smallest voxel size. Overrides other matchImage and setSpacing.

transform.name: loadTransform
transform.label: Load Transform
transform.description: Load the transform to be applied.
